oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Sgt. Archibald Gipson (Gibson)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Archibald Gipson (Gibson), Co. D, 12th Ky. Inf. Regt., USA. Gipson was a farmer from Cumberland Co., Ky and enlisted at age 27 in Jan., 1862. Gipson received a wound to the shoulder in the pursuit of Hood's Confed. army after the Battle; of Nashville on Dec. 20, 1864 near Columbia, Tenn. He was mustered out of the army on July 11, 1865. He lived near Albany, Ky. after the war and received a pension for his wound.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gipson, Archibald
